title: Would laptop like this run league decent? Help a noob
body:
So im thinking to buy new laptop from wish (becouse im poor af) but im pretty suspicious how it would work running league even using shabby graphs, so i was hoping if someone who knows better about these would lighten me and help me to make this buy decision
If this one is in reality same worth as sand you can freely suggest me some laptop wich would run league decently and would be cheap this laptops price is 235Euros

**Aspects:
14.ich 1920x1080 FHD
Win10
Intel Apollo Lake N3350 1.1 GHz - 2.4 GHz 64Bit
"Powerful CPU"
4GB RAM + 64GB Memory
Intel HD Graphics 500 650Mhz - 700MHz 
Intel Apollo Lake: CPU Model
128GB:I/O Connectivity
**

replies.body: I couldn't tell you what pc to get, but what I can offer is our [recommended specs ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements)guide.  This should help find options best fit for you!
